alert.note: Alert for Luce (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 17 at 11:07AM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Michigan... Tahquamenon River near Paradise affecting Luce County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by this evening at 1000 PM EDT. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Elevated river levels caused by rain and snowmelt are occurring. * WHERE...Tahquamenon River near Paradise. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, The river exceeds bankfull stage * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EDT Monday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 9.5 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
